Alpha: 0.03a2

[u]0.03a2[/u]
- Better Tutorial Framework!
[u]0.03a1[/u]
- Added better clicklable roads sprites
- Reworked Road colliders
- Added Tutorials
- Added 2 more levels

Spanish:
[u]0.03a2[/u]
- Sistema de tutoriales mejorado!
[u]0.03a1[/u]
- Mejores sprites clickables de carreteras
- Rediseñado colisionadores de carretera
- Añadidos tutoriales
- Añadidos 2 nivles jugables
- Ahora el nivel puede terminar antes de tiempo (Si todas las misiones fueron cumplidas)

- Arreglados diversos errores de interfaz
- Arreglados diversos errores con la Música.

English: Skip
Repeat Tutorial
Touch here to continue
Touch anywhere to continue

Welcome to [FF5454FF]Truck City[-].

Your Job is to Deliver Cargo from one place to another.
Spanish: Bienvenido a [FF5454FF]Truck City[-].\n\nTu tarea es llevar carga de un sitio a otro.

English: [EE82EE]Pink Cargo[-] has to be delivered to -
- buildings that accepts [EE82EE]Pink Cargo[-]
And the same for [8B6914]Brown Cargo[-]!
Spanish: Y lo mismo para el [8B6914]Cargamento Marrón[-]!

English: For that you will use these [FF5454FF]trucks[-]
Trucks are stupid, You will have to touch on certain roads to [FF5454FF]rotate[-] them in order to guide their path
Spanish: "Los camiones son estupidos. Tendras que [FF5454FF]tocar[-] en ciertas carreteras para rotarlas y guiar su camino"

English: This is a Rotable road, a [5DFC0A]Green Road[-]
Spanish: Esta es una Carretera girable, en concreto, una [5DFC0A]Carretera Verde[-]

English: [5DFC0A]Green Roads[-] are simple, they rotate 90 degrees each time you touch them
Spanish: Las [5DFC0A]Carreteras Verdes[-] son sencillas, se giran 90 grados cada vez que las tocas

English: You will recive [FFE600]Stars[-] everytime you compelete Missions
Spanish: Recibiras [FFE600]Estrellas[-] cada vez que completes una misión

English: [FFE600]Stars[-] allow you to unlock more levels
You can find the Missions at the begining of each level and in the pause menu
Spanish: Puedes encontrar las Misiones de cada nivel al principio de cada uno, y en el menú de pause

English: And a quick look on Missions over here too
Lastly, each level will feature a timer to acomplish the level;"Finalmente
Spanish: cada nivel tiene un temporizador aquí"

English: As you saw before, There are more than one kinds of cargo\nBut also, the are more kind of rotable roads
Spanish: Como se vió anteriormente, Hay mas de un tipo de cargamento\nPero tambien hay mas tipos de carreteras que se pueden rotar

English: This are the [9B30FF]Anchor Roads[-]
It has the property that one of the sides is locked, and the other one moves after each touch
Spanish: Tiene la proiedad de que uno de los lados de la carretera no se mueve, mientras que el otro lo hace tras cada toque

English: Observe the position of the icon
This road is anchored on its West side
Spanish: Esta carretera está anclada por su lado Oeste

English: And this one is anchored on its East side
Spanish: Y esta está anclada por su lado Este

English: Beware! On this level you now control 2 trucks!
This is a [009ACD]Blue Road[-]
[009ACD]Blue Roads[-] are straight roads that alternate between an horizontal road and a vertical road upon touching them
Spanish: Las [009ACD]Carreteras Azules[-] son carreteras rectas que se alternan entre una carretera horizontal y vertical cuando se las toca

English: Getting all the [FFE600]Stars[-] on this level might be a little harder than before
Spanish: Conseguir todas las [FFE600]Estrellas[-] en este nivel puede ser mas dificil que antes

English: Dont despair! You can restart at any time from the pause menu
Spanish: No desesperes! Puedes reiniciar en cualquier momento desde el menú de pause

English: The [C1CDCD]?[-] icon on the pause menú will close the menú while the game is stopped, so you can plan your stratergy\nAlso you can repeat this tutorial from there
Spanish: El icono [C1CDCD]?[-] del menú de pause cerrará dicho menú manteniendo el  juego pausado, de manera que puedas planear tu estrategia\nAdemas, desde allí podras repetir este tutorial

English: Also, remenber that Trucks can turn around when they cannot enter to the next road
Spanish: Ademas, recuerda que los camiones tambien pueden dar la vuelta cuando no pueden entrar a la siguiente carretera!

English: [FF5454FF]Time is really important[-] on this one
Factories not always produce infinte amounts of Cargo
Spanish: Las factorias no siempre producen cargamento infinito

English: Sometimes they store a limited amount of Cargo Items
Spanish: A veces almacenan una cantidad limitada de Carga

English: And produces [FF5454FF]more[-] cargo every once in a while when it's capacity isn't full
Spanish: Y producen [FF5454FF]más[-] cargamento de cada cierto tiempo cuando no están llenos

English: Try to synchronize the arrival of your trucks with the production times of the factories
Spanish: Intenta sincronizar la llegada de tus camiones con la producción de las factorias

English: For that: sometimes it's better to make your Trucks to lose some time
Spanish: Para ello: a veces es mejor hacer que tus camiones pierdan el tiempo

English: Each Delivery yields different amounts of money
Spanish: Cada envio da una cantidad diferente de dinero

English: This one only yields 9 $
But this yields 30 $
Make a good decision to where send your trucks!
Spanish: Decide donde deben ir tus camiones!

English: [FF5454FF]Something's Burning![-]
These are [FF5454FF]Road Blocks[-] they block one lane of the Road
Spanish: Estos son [FF5454FF]Bloqueos[-] y bloquean un carril

English: Your Trucks will [FF5454FF]Turn Around[-] when encountering a Road Block
Spanish: Tus camiones [FF5454FF]Daran la vuelta[-] cuando se encuenten con un Bloqueo.

English: Try to use it on your advantage
Also, this [FFFFFF]white icon[-] means this factory accepts any kind of cargo
Spanish: Ademas,este [FFFFFF]icono blanco[-] significa que esta fabrica acepta cualquier tipo de cargamento

English: On this level we have added one more truck!
Spanish: En este nivel hemos añadido un nuevo camión!

English: Worry not, overall speed is slower
But don't sleep or trucks will run wild!
Spanish: Pero presta atención o los camiones se te descontrolaran
